name: Huseyngulu Sarabski
description: '''Huseyngulu Sarabski''' ({{langx|az|Hüseynqulu Sarabski}}), born '''Hüseynqulu Malik oğlu Rzayev''' (20 March 1879 – 16 February 1945), was an [[Azerbaijan]]i [[opera]] singer ([[tenor]]), composer, [[playwright]], [[Actor|stage actor]], [[theatre director]], and [[musician]] ([[Tar (string instrument)|tar]]).
